channel.title: Logs on Ryan Galliher
channel.description: Recent content in Logs on Ryan Galliher

item.title: 2026-01-23: [Strength Day]
item.description:
Planned Workout

Full body workout:

  • Romanian deadlifts 3x9 @ 225 lbs
  • Leg press 3x14 @ 280 lbs
  • Dumbbell bent over row 3x10 @ 65 lbs
  • Cable bicep curls 3x8 @ 100 lbs
  • Cable tricep pushdown 3x8 @ 140 lbs
  • Dumbbell lat raises 3x10 @ 10 lbs
  • Lying bicep curl 3x8 @ 20 lbs
  • Walking lunges 3x9 @ 20 lbs

Daily Briefing

Today’s Focus: Prioritize form and control in each lift, especially the Romanian deadlifts to protect your lower back.

item.title: 2026-01-22: [Swim Day]
item.description:
Planned Workout

Technique-focused swim: - Warm-up: 200m easy freestyle - Drills: 4x50m kickboard, 4x50m pull buoy, 4x50m one-arm drill - Main set: 4x100m freestyle with focus on high elbow catch - Cool-down: 100m easy backstroke

Makeup from Wednesday: Running intervals: 6x400m @ 5K pace with 90s jog recovery

Daily Briefing

Today’s Focus: Focus on maintaining a high elbow catch and smooth entry during the main set.

item.title: 2026-01-21: [Recovery Day]
item.description:
Planned Workout

No protocol found - please create weekly protocol first.

Daily Briefing

Today’s Focus: Create your weekly protocol to start tracking

Tips:

  • Set up your weekly training schedule
  • Log all stats daily

Today’s Todos

  • Perform today’s workout
  • Create weekly protocol

Daily Habits

  • Morning meditation
  • Read 10 minutes
  • Stretch 10 minutes
  • Journal before bed
  • No phone first hour
  • Create content 10 minutes
  • Communicate with clients for one hour
  • Post one substack note each day

Quick Log

item.title: 2026-01-20: [Strength Day]
item.description:
Planned Workout

Full body workout:

  • Close grip bench press 3x8 @ 115 lbs
  • Cable seated row 3x11 @ 120 lbs
  • Barbell shoulder press 3x7 @ 85 lbs
  • Assisted pull up 3x2 @ 50 lbs
  • Dumbbell lying tricep extension 3x9 @ 20 lbs
  • Dumbbell incline curl 3x8 @ 20 lbs
  • Walking lunges 3x8 @ 20 lbs
  • Lying leg curl 3x10 @ 125 lbs

Daily Briefing

Today’s Focus: Maintain perfect form on all lifts to prevent lower back strain.

item.title: 2026-01-14: [Run Day]
item.description:
Planned Workout

Running intervals: 6x400m @ 5K pace with 90s jog recovery

Daily Briefing

Today’s Focus: Nail those running intervals - your sleep quality is improving, and you’re ready to push!

Tips:

  • Your sleep quality was 8.5 last night - use that energy to hit each interval strong.
  • You’ve missed stretching for several days - dedicate 10 minutes to a full-body stretch post-workout.
  • Hydrate well before and after the workout to support recovery.

Today’s Todos

  • Log all stats and narrative
  • Schedule substack
  • Merge outstanding PRs
  • Schedule substack and ideate content
  • Finish linked in integration
  • Perform today’s workout

Daily Habits

  • Morning meditation
    • Setup: Place meditation cushion by bed before sleep
  • Read 10 minutes
    • Setup: Keep book on nightstand with bookmark visible
  • Stretch 10 minutes
    • Setup: Leave yoga mat unrolled by TV
  • Journal before bed
    • Setup: Place journal and pen on pillow after making bed
  • No phone first hour
    • Setup: Charge phone in another room overnight
  • Create content 10 minutes
    • Setup: Need ideas here
  • Communicate with clients for one hour
    • Setup: first time each day we log into the computer, check client comms
  • Post one substack note each day
    • Setup: I can’t think of a good setup action for this one

Daily Stats

Metric Value Notes
Weight (lbs) 0
Sleep Hours 0
Sleep Quality 0 1-10
Morning Mood 0 1-10
Bedtime Mood 0

Training Output

Activity Dist/Time HR / Watts
Run (mi) 0

item.title: 2026-01-13: [Strength Day]
item.description:
Planned Workout

Full body strength (Close grip bench press 3x8 @ 115, Cable seated row 3x11 @ 130, Barbell shoulder press 3x8 @ 85, Assisted pull up 3x3 @ 50, Dumbbell lying tricep extension 3x9 @ 20, Dumbbell incline curl 3x8 @ 20, Walking lunges 3x9 @ 20, Lying leg curl 3x10 @ 125)

Today’s Focus: Prioritize form and control in each lift to prevent injury and build strength safely.

item.title: 2026-01-07: [Swim Day]
item.description:
Planned Workout

800m swim: 4x200m with 1:00 rest between sets. Focus on technique and form.

Daily Briefing

Today’s Focus: Focus on perfecting your swim technique and form - this is your foundation for the half ironman.

Alerts:

  • Sleep has been under 6.5hrs for 3 days - consider cutting volume 20% if you feel fatigued.

Tips:

  • Your back has been bothering you - ensure you warm up properly and stretch your lower back post-workout.
  • You’ve been skipping stretching 3 days in a row - dedicate 10 minutes post-workout to stretching, especially your quads, calves, and lower back.
  • Hydrate well before and after the session to support muscle recovery and performance.

Today’s Todos

  • Finish PM agent
  • Work on curating second brain
  • Ensure network mapping is working and relevant
  • Get LinkedIn integrated properly with the different embedding spaces
  • Deep dive of brands 2025 (look for old run)
  • Reach out to existing customers and see how they are doing
  • Throw up link and article out on the research page
  • Literally just all the tasks you did not finish today.
  • Record a 10 minute YouTube video
  • Update BeStupid logs to do workouts more progressively and work on my phone offline
  • Perform today’s workout

Daily Habits

  • Morning meditation
    • Setup: Place meditation cushion by bed before sleep
  • Read 10 minutes
    • Setup: Keep book on nightstand with bookmark visible
  • Stretch 10 minutes
    • Setup: Leave yoga mat unrolled by TV
  • Journal before bed
    • Setup: Place journal and pen on pillow after making bed
  • No phone first hour
    • Setup: Charge phone in another room overnight
  • Create content 10 minutes
    • Setup: Need ideas here

Daily Stats

Metric Value Notes
Weight (lbs) 249.2
Sleep Hours 5:56
Sleep Quality 7.3 1-10
Morning Mood 2 1-10
Bedtime Mood 6

item.title: 2026-01-05: [Recovery Day]
item.description:
Planned Workout

Rest day or light stretching/yoga

Daily Briefing

Today’s Focus: Prioritize rest and recovery today - you’ve been running a sleep deficit and need to recharge.

Alerts:

  • Sleep has been under 6.5hrs for 3 days - consider cutting volume 20% if you feel fatigued.

Tips:

  • Your sleep has been under 6.5hrs for 3 days - aim for 7+ hours tonight to avoid further fatigue.
  • You skipped stretching 3 days in a row - dedicate 10 minutes to light stretching, especially your quads, calves, and lower back.
  • Hydrate well throughout the day to support muscle recovery and overall performance.

Today’s Todos

  • Perform today’s workout
  • Publish substacks and beehives, no exceptions. That does require creating a few images. Ideally this is done before 11 to review with mom.
  • Review network mapping
  • Finish PM agent
  • Review content plan with Gabe
  • Perform today’s workout
  • Continue work on chat GPT updates for LinkedIN and mapping embedding spaces
  • Work on curating second brain

item.title: 2026-01-04: [Run Day]
item.description:
Planned Workout

6mi easy pace (HR <150)

Daily Briefing

Today’s Focus: Maintain a steady, easy pace and keep your heart rate below 150 to build endurance without overtaxing your body.

Alerts:

  • Sleep has been under 6.5hrs for 3 days - consider cutting volume 20% if you feel fatigued.

Tips:

  • Your HR was 146 on yesterday’s short run - aim to keep it under 140 for today’s longer run.
  • You’ve been skipping stretching lately - dedicate 10 minutes post-run to stretching, especially your quads, calves, and lower back.
  • Hydrate well before and after the session to support muscle recovery and performance.

Today’s Todos

  • Perform today’s workout
  • Complete network mapping
  • Publish substacks and beehives, no exceptions. That does require creating a few images. Ideally this is done before 11 to review with mom.
  • Continue iterations on PM, I feel like it’s close?

Tips:

  • Your back has been bothering you - ensure you warm up properly and stretch your lower back post-workout.

  • You’ve been skipping stretching lately - dedicate 10 minutes post-workout to stretching, especially your quads and calves.
